6d4859c3-2651-47a5-80ef-a828f3ea9f4d.description: The Tribal Human Resource Professional Certification provides Indian Country with the practical knowledge and skills they need to handle the unique employment challenges facing tribal governments and their enterprises. Participants learn and apply employment laws, protecting Tribal sovereignty, discrimination, wage and hour issues, employee discipline, investigations, evaluations, leaves of absence, union activity, Indian preference, and more.
